resources.string: ATM and Branch locator
Find your nearest Absa ATM or branch with just a tap or two!
Stop debit orders and reverse single debit order payments
Take control of your debit orders and payments, select ‘Debit orders‘ from the menu
View your Will
Now you can view your Will that is in safe custody with Absa.\n\nSelect ‘Documents’ from your menu.
Temporary lock Debit Card
Lock and unlock your cards easily in the app. Choose which transactions you want locked temporarily.
Retrieve your ATM PIN
Get a quick reminder of your forgotten or lost card PIN right here on the App.\n\nSimply go to Cards to get started.
Manage Debit Card limits
Now you can manage the limits set on your debit card within your app.\n\nSimply go to your Menu and select Card to change or set new limits.
Use card when travelling
Now it\'s easier to see the world with your card. Activate it for international travel right here on the App. Go to Cards to get started.
Stop and replace your Cards
You can stop and replace your cards to keep your cash safe all within the app.\n\nGo to Cards from your Menu tab to get started.
Reinvest your Fixed Deposit account
You can now set reinvestment instructions for your fixed deposit account.
Our families mean everything
The Flexi Funeral Plan offers cover for you, your spouse, your children as well as extended members (even your gardener or caretaker).
Law For You at your service!
Don’t be caught off guard.\n\nProtect yourself against unexpected legal matters.
View your\nVehicle Finance
You can now view your Absa Vehicle Finance account details and download statements in your app.
Get your \n statements
You can now view and download your statements for your credit card and home loan accounts on your App.
View your tax certificates
Now you can download or view your tax certificate at your convenience\n\nSelect \'Documents\' from your menu
Overdraft application made easy
Get covered for life\'s unexpected moments with an overdraft on your business Cheque account. Simply go to Explore to get started.
Get your bank confirmation letter
You can now download a bank confirmation letter for free, from Documents in your Menu
Manage your profile
Manage Profile allows you to update all your personal details on the Absa Mobile App.
View your Card Details
Want to do online shopping but don’t have your card nearby? For your convenience, you can now see all of your card details, including CVV number and expiry date with just a few taps.
Receive international funds directly
Now you can receive funds from anyone anywhere in the world directly into your account. Borderless Banking made easy. Go to International Banking under the Menu to share your SWIFT banking details.
Send to many with CashSend Plus.

Now it\'s easier to send money to multiple beneficiaries and manage your limits for Business Banking customers. Register for CashSend Plus right in the app.\n\nGo to your regular CashSend to get started.
Never share your banking details with anyone.

Absa will never ask you for card details, an OTP or your logon details. Absa will never request approval to reverse an unauthorised or fraudulent transaction via your cellphone. If you ever receive any of the above requests, report them immediately via our Fraud Hotline on 0860\u00A0557\u00A0557.
Start saving with a Future Plan account
With Absa Future Plan, you can start small and grow your investment, and invite others to help you reach your savings goal. Go to the explore hub to open an account now.
QR\u00a0Payments
Do you often leave or forget your wallet at home? No worries, use your Absa Banking App to make purchases by scanning a QR code where it is offered, at a pay point and/or online.
Lowest banking fees in South Africa
We\'ve heard you, South Africa!\nFrom 1 March, we introduced our new fees for our Everyday Banking Accounts, providing R500 million in pricing relief to our valued customers.
Scan your face to link devices
Link your phone to the Absa Banking App using Absa ID with our new, highly secure facial recognition technology.
Open an account for your Business
Open a new Business Evolve account and see the benefits of having an account that changes to meet your business needs.\n\nSelect \'Business Bank Account\' inside the Explore Hub to apply.
